metadata.description: Spells that create thoughts, emotions, and mental abilities

spells.name: Gift of Reason
spells.description: Grants an animal human-level intelligence and the ability to understand and speak one language. The animal retains its natural instincts.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create intelligence), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite

spells.name: Blessing of Perfect Memory
spells.description: Grants the target perfect recall of everything they experience during the spell's duration. Memories formed are permanent and crystal clear.

spells.name: Inspire Courage in the Fearful Heart
spells.description: Fills the targets with supernatural courage and confidence. They become immune to fear and fight with enhanced bravery.

spells.name: Words of Unspoken Understanding
spells.description: Creates a telepathic link between willing participants, allowing them to communicate thoughts without speaking. The link is mutual.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create mental connection), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Group

spells.name: Passion of Righteous Anger
spells.description: Fills the target with burning anger toward a specific person or cause. The anger is intense but focused, not causing mindless rage.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create emotion), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +1 for intensity

spells.name: Gift of Tongues
spells.description: Grants the target the ability to speak and understand any language they encounter. The knowledge is temporary but complete.

spells.name: Shield of Mental Fortitude
spells.description: Creates powerful mental defenses that protect against mind control, mental intrusion, and psychic attacks. The mind becomes fortress-like.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create mental protection), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for strong defense

spells.name: Vision of the Distant Scene
spells.description: Creates a mental image of a distant location the caster has visited before. The vision is current and shows what is happening now.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create distant vision), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Imaginem requisite

spells.name: Dreams of Prophetic Truth
spells.description: Grants the target a prophetic dream that reveals important information about future events. The dream is symbolic but true.

spells.name: Spark of Creative Genius
spells.description: Dramatically enhances the target's creativity and artistic ability. They gain inspiration and skill in their chosen art form.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (enhance mental ability), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for artistic enhancement

spells.name: Memory Palace of Perfect Order
spells.description: Creates a perfect mental filing system in the target's mind, allowing them to store and organize vast amounts of information with ease.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create mental structure), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +2 for complexity
